flawed_nl_solution:
Emma’s sister is 7 + 9 = <<7+9=16>>16 years old.
In this many years, Emma’s sister will be 56 years old: 56 - 16 = <<56-16=44>>44 years.
When her sister is 56 years old, Emma will be 7 + 44 = <<7+44=51>>51 years.
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 44. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
